attributes.action: Occupy London Stock Exchange; Discuss more indepth
attributes.additional_details:
Introduction - Occupy LSE wish to make a peaceful point in line with the satellite camps around the world. With it's focus on corporate greed and mismanagement of assets by government.

Actions - Review the current situation, focusing on the closure of St Pauls Cathedral to begin with, as no H&S concerns have been raised legitimately. And the concerns whether revenue would have increased due to the protest.

Question every member of parliament over share holdings and capital investments held by each. Focus on the spin off's of giant banks and their current investment areas

Question the Bias of each member of parliament and ask them where they bank and why.

Begin the changes needed!
